Title: A Day in the Death...
Plot: Idzik faces his enemies; the intrigues behind the Loewen case get more complicated; changes are made in the hospital; the Muslims run into business trouble; Rebadow and Stella get closer; and the inmates rally to support the O'Reilys.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual violence,drug use,offensive language and sex scenes.
Writer: Tom Fontana, Sunil Nayar, Bradford Winters
